articles.content: The new FX series Welcome to Wrexham is a strange little bundle of bafflements. Its half-hour episodes go down smooth but can leave you feeling unsure how to process what you just saw. The first half… [+10428 chars]

Volunteer Jo said everything they had was destroyed.
